00142         // cloak generators
00143         bool CloakGen_InclHouse(unsigned int idx)
00144                 { return ((1 << idx) & this->CloakedByHouses) != 0; }
00145 
00146         void CloakGen_AddHouse(unsigned int idx)
00147                 { this->CloakedByHouses |= 1 << idx; }
00148 
00149         void CloakGen_RemHouse(unsigned int idx)
00150                 { this->CloakedByHouses &= ~(1 << idx); }

00225         // HACK EVIL HACK
00226         static int BridgeHeight()
00227         { return *(int *)0xB0C07C; }
00228 
00229         static CoordStruct * Cell2Coord(CellStruct* cell, CoordStruct *crd)
00230         {
00231                 crd->X = cell->X * 256 + 128;
00232                 crd->Y = cell->Y * 256 + 128;
00233                 crd->Z = 0;
00234                 return crd;
00235         }
00236 
00237         static CellStruct * Coord2Cell(CoordStruct *crd, CellStruct* cell)
00238         {
00239                 cell->X = short(crd->X / 256);
00240                 cell->Y = short(crd->Y / 256);
00241                 return cell;
00242         }
00243 
00244         CoordStruct * FixHeight(CoordStruct *crd)
00245         {
00246                 crd->Z += ((this->Flags & cf_Bridge) != 0) * BridgeHeight();
00247                 return crd;
00248         }
